com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.processors

Class DefaultValidationViewProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.processors.SimpleEntityViewProcessorAdapter
      • com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.processors.DefaultValidationViewProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityViewProcessor

    @Component
 @Exposed
 @Scope(value="prototype")
public class DefaultValidationViewProcessor
extends SimpleEntityViewProcessorAdapter
    Applies default validation in case of a PUT, POST, DELETE or PATCH request (state modifying). Sets the EntityViewCommandValidator and applies it.

    This processor should by preference come as early as possible as it sets the default validator.

    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme
